sentences.chinese: 獲2005年國際沙龍杯葡萄酒賽銀獎獎。

sentences.english: International Wine and Spirit Competition London 2009, Silver, Best in Class.
sentences.chinese: 2009年國際葡萄酒及烈酒倫敦展，銀獎。

sentences.english: A further three bronze and five silver awards were given out.
sentences.chinese: 其它三個銅獎和五個銀獎均已授出。

sentences.english: After Zhang Jiahuan gained a series of national golden and silver medal awards.
sentences.chinese: 張佳歡在取得了一系列國家級金獎銀獎之後。

sentences.english: Q. Can I just select the NF Prem option for the Gold and Silver prizes and avoid the drawing?
sentences.chinese: 我可以選擇跟金銀獎等值的遊戲中物品而避免抽獎嗎？

sentences.english: The Tombs of Atuan was a Newbery Honor Book in 1972.
sentences.chinese: 地海古墓是1972年紐伯利兒童文學銀獎作品。

sentences.english: Silver Medal, Concours Des Grands Vins De France, Macon 2011
sentences.chinese: 2011年法國勃艮第馬孔“特級葡萄酒競賽“銀獎。

sentences.english: She won a silver trophy for shooting.
sentences.chinese: 她在射擊比賽中獲得銀獎。

sentences.english: Watercolor work, "Diary of paintings miners, " provincial Show Silver Award.
sentences.chinese: 水彩作品《礦工日記組畫》獲省展銀獎。

sentences.english: Then they get to pick two 'silvers' to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們要挑出兩個供考慮的“銀獎”。

sentences.english: Tang Jian person as a Silver Award winner and the representative took the floor to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 唐健人作爲銀獎獲得者代表上臺發言並領獎。

definition: special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to be chosen/to be elected as
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
